https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null During an adventure spanning two years and two countries, two mega-fans of "A Christmas Story" set out to discover all the film's shooting locations. Along the way they uncover forgotten facts, discover little-known locations and recover long-lost movie memorabilia. A Christmas Story Documentary: Road Trip For Ralphie
